characterInfo.Aliases: Shallan Davar, Veil, Radiant, Kishi, Formless

characterDescription:
Swiftspren is yet another of Shallan's aliases. She is so named by a random beggar in who's lap she drops a package of food. He says that she robs from the rich and that nobody can stop her; that she's a spren.
Shallan has cultivated this reputation in effort to get the Cult of Moments to recognize her and invite her to join them, specifically so she can get to the Oathgate in Kholinar. She's also enhanced this reputation by sending Ishnah and Vathah out into the city, wearing illusions to look like Veil, giving away food.
Thus, Swiftspren has come to be known as the hero of the markets.
Upon delivering foodstuffs to the cult, and when asked by a cultist why she is there, Swiftspren responds as follows:
